summary: An ordinance relating to, and creating and establishing, a special fund to be known as "Pest Destruction Fund", to be used for the payment of bounties for the destruction of earwigs; appropriating the sum of One Thousand ($1,000.00) Dollars from the General Fund therefor, and (such purpose not having been specified in any tax levy or official estimate) declaring the emergency making necessary such appropriation; and declaring an emergency.
